markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Freezing Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=713)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 257 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This chilly ammunition is dark blue and cold to the touch. When activated _freezing ammunition_ hits a target, the target must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or be [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round by the intense cold (slowed 1 for 1 minute on a critical failure).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Freezing Ammunition
